item.description:
Come see "Bubblemania" in Hamden (just heard about this last night)!  Casey Carle has appeared at Lincoln Center, around the world, on the Discovery Channel, and consulted for Cirque du Soleil.  He won a five-day bubble competition in Japan, being crowned "Champion Bubble Artist."

$3 at the Miller Cultural Complex, 1pm.  $2 for children.

Let's meet at 12:30 and find seats.

It is an all-ages show, featuring bubbles, comedy, music and science.  6-foot bubble spheres, soap film tubes more than 25 feet long, intricate bubble sculptures, disco balls made of bubbles, even a bubble that can encase people.

HOST: Jason, cell # in RSVP.  texting is fine.

PARKING: Free
item.name: Sat. 1/12 - Bubblemania, bubble/comedy/music/science show
